steps.title: Prepare for Your Next Big Meeting
steps.details: This playbook will ensure you are focused, informed, and ready to contribute. Let's get started.

steps.title: Review Meeting Agenda
steps.details: Open the meeting agenda or relevant documents to refresh your memory on the key topics.

steps.title: Preparation Checklist
steps.details: Complete these tasks to ensure you're ready.

subItems.text: Identify one key question to ask

steps.title: Knowledge Check: Primary Objective
steps.details: What is the primary objective of this meeting?

options.text: To give a general status update.
To make a final decision on the Q3 budget.
To brainstorm new ideas for next year.

steps.explanation: The pre-reading stated that the goal is to finalize the Q3 budget.

steps.title: Quick Refocus
steps.details: It seems there might be a misunderstanding of the meeting's goal. Please take a moment to re-read the agenda to ensure your contributions are on point. The primary objective is to finalize the Q3 budget.

steps.title: Knowledge Check: Stakeholders
steps.details: Select ALL attendees who are key decision-makers for this topic.
steps.explanation: Sarah is the product owner, and David leads the implementation team, making them both key decision-makers.

steps.title: Confirm Project Codename
steps.details: As mentioned in the briefing doc, what is the official codename for this project?
steps.explanation: The project was codenamed 'Project Phoenix' in the Q2 kickoff meeting.

steps.title: Final 2 Minutes of Focus
steps.details: Clear your mind, silence your notifications, and get ready to engage.

steps.title: Join the Meeting
steps.details: Opening your calendar to join the meeting.
